title: 【國立東華大學112學年度畢業典禮】敬邀出席🎉 [National Dong Hwa University 112th Academic Year Graduation Ceremony] Invitation to attend🎉
department: 學務處畢業生及校友服務組
author: 溫小姐
content:
分類： 活動公告, 其他公告
來源： 學務處畢業生及校友服務組 - 溫小姐 - fengting0804@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6282
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生_退休教職員_教職員眷屬
標題： 【國立東華大學112學年度畢業典禮】敬邀出席🎉 [National Dong Hwa University 112th Academic Year Graduation Ceremony] Invitation to attend🎉
日期： Mon, 27 May 2024 18:37:31 +0800
附檔： 20240601邀請函_封面.jpg (1 MB)   20240601邀請函_內頁.jpg (801 KB)   師長進場路線圖.pdf (165 KB)   師長座位安排.pdf (125 KB)   
各位親愛的師長您好：
        國立東華大學112學年度畢業典禮將於2024/06/01(週六)舉行🎊，誠摯的邀請各位師長一同至會場（體育館）給予畢業生們祝福。
        敬邀各位師長於當日下午15：20前抵達集合點(活動中心鏡廳)，在校長與副校長的陪伴下，帶領畢業生緩緩進入會場；並請您在抵達「師長祝福區」時暫停您的腳步，
將畢業生送入會場後，再由校長及副校長在畢業生的歡迎下，帶領各位師長一同入席。

💥【112學年度畢業典禮】專屬網頁訊息已放置於本校網站首頁，
內含畢業典禮所有相關資訊，歡迎查詢。
活動網址：https://graduation.ndhu.edu.tw/p/412-1202-21431.php?Lang=zh-tw
學生事務處  敬邀

Hello all dear teachers:
   The graduation ceremony for the 112th academic year of National Donghua University will be held on 2024/06/01 (Saturday)🎊,
We sincerely invite all dear teachers to come to the venue (gymnasium) to give blessings to the graduates.
   All teachers are cordially invited to arrive at the assembly point (Mirror Hall of the Activity Center) before 15:20 that afternoon.
    Accompanied by our president and vice-president lead the graduates into the venue, and please stop your steps when you arrive at the "teachers' blessing area". 
After welcoming the graduates into the venue, the president and vice-president will lead all the teachers to sit down together.

💥[Graduation Ceremony for the 112th Academic Year] 

Exclusive webpage information has been placed on the homepage of the school website. The website contains all relevant information about the graduation ceremony, welcome to inquire.
Event website: 
https://graduation.ndhu.edu.tw/p/412-1202-21431.php?Lang=zh-tw
 
Warming  invitation from the Office of Student Affairs.
